remarks: Membership in value of the partial isomorphism C is closed under scalar product.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dicvscacl.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dicvscacl.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dicvscacl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dicvscacl.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicvscacl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicvscacl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoC ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicvscacl.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dicvscacl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ ( X e. E /\ Y e. ( I ` Q ) ) ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. ( I ` Q ) ) $.
